author: Staff Reporter
text:
Washermanpet police arrested two men on the charge of assaulting a duty doctor at Government Stanley Hospital on Wednesday.

Police said Rajasekar of Nainiappan Street had come to the hospital for treatment to injuries he had sustained. He was accompanied by his friend Yuvaraj.

Even as the staff on duty were administering first aid, the two men picked up a quarrel with them and assaulted the duty doctor. On a complaint from the doctor, the police arrested the men. – Staff Reporter
title: 2 held for assaulting doctor
